entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 p.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:40 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 6:40 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:40 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
